alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 03 at 8:06PM PDT until November 04 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Antelope Valley, Southern Salinas Valley and San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
